title: Veggie Sushi Roll
directions: Wrap bamboo mat in plastic wrap.
Place nori sheet shiny-side down on the mat.
Spread sushi rice evenly over the nori, leaving a 1-inch strip at the top.
Lay avocado slices, cucumber strips, and scallion across the center of the rice.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat, tucking the filling as you go.
Wet a sharp knife and slice the roll into 6-8 pieces using a single clean downward motion. Wet the knife between each cut.
notes: Roll this one first as a warm-up - it is forgiving and builds confidence. Optional additions: thin carrot matchsticks, a small amount of cream cheese, or a very light brush of toasted sesame oil on the rice. Pairs well with soy sauce and wasabi on the side.
